elements.name: User should arrange product in alphabetical order successfully

steps.name: I mouse hover and click on desktop tab
I click on show all desktops
I click on sort by position
I select product sort by "Name (Z - A)"
I should see product arrange in alphabetical order successfully

elements.name: User should add product to shopping cart successfully

steps.name: I mouse hover and click on desktop tab
I click on show all desktops
I select currency "£Pound Sterling"
I select product sort by "Name (A - Z)"
I select product "HP LP3065"
I should navigate to "HP LP3065" product page
I select date "2022","November","30"
I add quantity "1" for product
I click on add to cart button
I should see product added successfully message
I click on shopping cart button
I should see shopping cart text
I should see "HP LP3065" product name
I should see "2022-11-30" delivery date
I should see "Product 21" model name
I should see total price

name: Desktop page test
description: As a user I want to check desktop page and add product into cart

elements.name: User should arrange product in price high to low order successfully

steps.name: I mouse hover and click on laptop and notebook tab
I click on show all laptop and notebook
I click on sort by position
I select product sort by "Price (High > Low)"
I should see product arrange in price high to low order successfully
I mouse hover and click on laptop and notebook tab
I click on show all laptop and notebook
I select currency "£Pound Sterling"
I select product sort by "Price (High > Low)"
I select product "Macbook" from laptop and notebook page
I should navigate to "MacBook" product
I click on add to cart button
I should see product macbook added successfully message
I click on shopping cart button
I should see shopping cart text
I should see "MacBook" product
I change quantity "2" for product
I click on update quantity
I should see cart modified message
I should see total price for macbook products
I click on checkout button
I should navigate to checkout page
I should see new customer text
I click on guest checkout button
I click on continue button of guest checkout page
I filled all mandatory field of checkout page
I click on continue after fill all detail on checkout page
I add comments to text area about product order
I click checkbox of terms and condition
I click on continue of checkout
I should see warning message regarding Payment method

name: Laptop And Notebook Page Test
description: As a user I want to check functionality of laptop and notebook page

elements.name: User should navigate to login page successfully

steps.name: I click on my account link
I select "Login" option from my account options
I should navigate to login page successfully

elements.name: User should login and logout successfully

steps.name: I click on my account link
I select "Login" option from my account options
I enter email "prime123@gmail.com"
I enter password "Prime123"
I click on login button
I should login successfully
I click on my account link
I select "Logout" option from my account options
I should logout successfully
I click on continue button

name: Login Page Test
description: As a user I want to check login/logout functionality

elements.name: User should navigate to register page successfully

steps.name: I click on my account link
I select "Register" option from my account options
I should navigate to register page successfully
I click on my account link
I select "Register" option from my account options
I filled all mandatory field of registration
I click on continue button of registration page
I should see account successfully created message
I click on continue
I click on my account link
I select "Logout" option from my account options
I should logout successfully
I click on continue button

name: Register Page Test
description: As a user i want to do registration into tutorial ninja website

steps.name: I mouse hover and click on desktop tab
I select menu "Show All Desktops"
I should navigate to desktop page successfully

elements.name: User should navigate to laptop and notebook page successfully

steps.name: I mouse hover and click on laptop and notebook tab
I select menu "Show All Laptops & Notebooks"
I should navigate to laptop and notebook page successfully

elements.name: User should navigate to component page successfully

steps.name: I mouse hover and click on component tab
I select menu "Show All Components"

description: As a user I want to check top menu tab options on Homepage
